definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: It may be fascism, or barbarism.
sentences.chinese: 那可能是法西斯主义，或暴力主义。

sentences.english: What they really want is a one-party fascist dictatorship.
sentences.chinese: 他们实际上要的是法西斯主义的一党专政。

sentences.english: They also thought that only the Soviet Union would be powerful enough to defeat Fascism.
sentences.chinese: 他们还认为苏联是能够战胜法西斯主义的唯一力量。

sentences.english: When fascism comes to America, it will come wrapped in an America flag.
sentences.chinese: ‘法西斯主义登陆美国时，总会包着一面美国旗。’

sentences.english: It opens on the narrow path toward racial fascism.
sentences.chinese: 这样的定义，开辟了通向种族法西斯主义的狭路。

sentences.english: A one-party state can be the start of the slippery slopetowards fascism.
sentences.chinese: 一党专政有可能是滑向法西斯主义的起点。

sentences.english: Fascism had lawlessly overthrown the democratic government of this country.
sentences.chinese: 法西斯主义非法推翻了这个国家的民主政府。

sentences.english: The old man was seized with burning hatred for the fascists.
sentences.chinese: 老人对法西斯主义者充满了仇恨。

sentences.english: She has a profound hatred of fascism.
sentences.chinese: 她对法西斯主义怀有深仇大恨。

sentences.english: Fascism cannot save capitalism, but only hastens its destruction.
sentences.chinese: 法西斯主义救不了资本主义，而只会加快其灭亡。

sentences.english: The people struggled together against fascism.
sentences.chinese: 人们齐心与法西斯主义作斗争。

sentences.english: Due to its(peculiarity) in creation, it is undoubtedly a masterpiece of anti-fascism literature after the World War II.
sentences.chinese: 反法西斯主义是德国文学长写不衰的一大主题。

sentences.english: Fascism was on the march in Germany and Italy.
sentences.chinese: 法西斯主义在德国和意大利兴起。

sentences.english: Anti-fascism is one everlasting theme in German literature.
sentences.chinese: 反法西斯主义是德国文学长写不衰的一大主题。

sentences.english: Top4 Money-hungry fascists are dead inside.
sentences.chinese: 金钱饥渴的法西斯主义者们内心腐朽。

pinyin: guo2 jia1 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4

definition: nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism
